description: Collects statistical metrics from Apache Storm nimbus master.

paramSchema.title: Storm UI Host
paramSchema.name: serverHost
paramSchema.description: The Apache Storm UI service host (default: 'localhost').

paramSchema.title: Storm UI Port
paramSchema.name: serverPort
paramSchema.description: The Apache Storm UI service port (default: 8091).

paramSchema.title: Poll Retry Count
paramSchema.name: pollRetryCount
paramSchema.description: The number of times to retry failed HTTP requests (default: 5, infinite: 0).

paramSchema.title: Poll Retry Delay
paramSchema.name: pollRetryDelay
paramSchema.description: The interval (in milliseconds) to wait before retrying a failed request (default: 3000).

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to poll the Storm UI node for metrics (default: 5000).

paramSchema.title: Show All Topologies
paramSchema.name: showAllTopologies
paramSchema.description: Show metrics for all topologies and ignore showTopologies array (default: true).

paramSchema.title: Show Topologies
paramSchema.name: showTopologies
paramSchema.description: Select topologies (by name or id) to show metrics for (default: []).

paramSchema.title: Show Bolts
paramSchema.name: showBolts
paramSchema.description: Show metrics for each bolt in each topology (default: true).

paramSchema.title: Show Spouts
paramSchema.name: showSpouts
paramSchema.description: Show metrics for each spout in each topology (default: true).
